text:
- As deep learning models
become more complex,

businesses grapple with
exponential increase
in time and cost to train them.

Amazon EC2 Trn1 instances
are purpose-built

for high performance, cost
effective deep learning training
of natural language processing, vision,
or recommendation models.

You can train more with the
same budget or save up to 50%

in training costs over
equivalent GPU-based instances.
Trn1 instances are powered by up to 16

AWS-built Tranium chips, which
have hardware optimizations

for a wide range of data
types, dynamic input shapes,

C++ custom operators,
and stochastic rounding.
Combined with Neuron-Link
for fastest accelerator connectivity

and the highest networking
bandwidth in the AWS cloud
for multi-node distributed training,

Trn1 instances can help
you innovate faster
by reducing time and cost to train.

We are also building Trn1 ultra
clusters at a massive scale
with non-blocking petabyte scale network
so you can have on-demand access to one

of the largest machine
learning clusters in the world.

You can get started easily
with just a few lines

of code changes using leading
ML frameworks and libraries

as Neuron SDK integrates
with them seamlessly.
Our many tools and managed services
support training your models on Trn1.
Once trained, you can deploy your models
on the hardware platform of your choice.
Get high performance and low cost
for deep learning training in the cloud.
